headline.main: Okposo's Shootout Goal Lifts Islanders Past Rangers, 2-1
headline.print_headline: Okposo's Shootout Goal Lifts Islanders Past Rangers, 2-1

docs.snippet: Two months into the New York Islanders' first season in Brooklyn, a visit from the crosstown-rival New York Rangers provided the most raucous atmosphere in their new home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two months into the New York Islanders' first season in Brooklyn, a visit from the crosstown-rival New York Rangers provided the most raucous atmosphere in their new home.

headline.main: British Bombers Conduct First Air Strikes on Syria-Government Source
headline.print_headline: British Bombers Conduct First Air Strikes on Syria-Government Source

docs.snippet: British Tornado bombers conducted their first air strikes on Syria just hours after parliament approved Prime Minister David Cameron's plan to strike at Islamic State militants in Syria, a government source said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: British Tornado bombers conducted their first air strikes on Syria just hours after parliament approved Prime Minister David Cameron's plan to strike at Islamic State militants in Syria, a government source said on Thursday.

docs.snippet: Noel (Kentucker Audley) ventures from upstate New York to Brooklyn to sell Christmas trees, in this film by Charles Poekel....
docs.abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews film Christmas, Again, written and directed by Charles Poekel and starring Kentucker Audley.
docs.lead_paragraph: Noel (Kentucker Audley) ventures from upstate New York to Brooklyn to sell Christmas trees, in this film by Charles Poekel.

headline.main: Harden Scores 24 as Rockets Beat Pelicans 108-101
headline.print_headline: Harden Scores 24 as Rockets Beat Pelicans 108-101

docs.snippet: James Harden scored 24 points to lead balanced scoring by Houston and the Rockets overcame a double-digit deficit for a 108-101 win over the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: James Harden scored 24 points to lead balanced scoring by Houston and the Rockets overcame a double-digit deficit for a 108-101 win over the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Jackson Rallies Pistons Past Suns 127-122 in OT
headline.print_headline: Jackson Rallies Pistons Past Suns 127-122 in OT

docs.snippet: Reggie Jackson scored 24 of his 34 points after halftime, and the Detroit Pistons rallied from 16 down in the fourth quarter to beat the Phoenix Suns 127-122 in overtime Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Reggie Jackson scored 24 of his 34 points after halftime, and the Detroit Pistons rallied from 16 down in the fourth quarter to beat the Phoenix Suns 127-122 in overtime Wednesday night.

headline.main: Boyette Leads No. 6 Texas Women Past No. 9 Mississippi State
headline.print_headline: Boyette Leads No. 6 Texas Women Past No. 9 Mississippi State

docs.snippet: Imani Boyette prefers playing defense, where she uses her 6-foot-7 frame to deter Texas' opponents....
docs.lead_paragraph: Imani Boyette prefers playing defense, where she uses her 6-foot-7 frame to deter Texas' opponents.

headline.main: No. 21 Oklahoma Women Top Arkansas-Little Rock 65-52
headline.print_headline: No. 21 Oklahoma Women Top Arkansas-Little Rock 65-52

docs.snippet: Kaylon Williams scored 21 points and grabbed 15 rebounds, and No. 21 Oklahoma pulled away to win 65-52 over Arkansas-Little Rock on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kaylon Williams scored 21 points and grabbed 15 rebounds, and No. 21 Oklahoma pulled away to win 65-52 over Arkansas-Little Rock on Wednesday night.

headline.main: No. 11 Kentucky Women Defeat Northern Kentucky 84-65
headline.print_headline: No. 11 Kentucky Women Defeat Northern Kentucky 84-65

docs.snippet: Janee Thompson scored 11 of her 21 points in the second half and No. 11 Kentucky rallied from a four-point halftime deficit to remain unbeaten, winning on the road at Northern Kentucky 84-65 on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Janee Thompson scored 11 of her 21 points in the second half and No. 11 Kentucky rallied from a four-point halftime deficit to remain unbeaten, winning on the road at Northern Kentucky 84-65 on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Lowry Sizzles in 4th, Raptors Rally From 17 Down to Win
headline.print_headline: Lowry Sizzles in 4th, Raptors Rally From 17 Down to Win

docs.snippet: Kyle Lowry scored 22 of his season-high 31 points in the fourth quarter, DeMar DeRozan added 17 points and the Toronto Raptors rallied from 17 down in the third to beat the Atlanta Hawks 96-86 on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kyle Lowry scored 22 of his season-high 31 points in the fourth quarter, DeMar DeRozan added 17 points and the Toronto Raptors rallied from 17 down in the third to beat the Atlanta Hawks 96-86 on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Shelton Roasts Bryan at CMT Artists of the Year Show
headline.print_headline: Shelton Roasts Bryan at CMT Artists of the Year Show

docs.snippet: Country star Blake Shelton interrupted the lovefest on the CMT Artists of the Year show with a slightly profane mini-roast of his good friend Luke Bryan....
docs.lead_paragraph: Country star Blake Shelton interrupted the lovefest on the CMT Artists of the Year show with a slightly profane mini-roast of his good friend Luke Bryan.
